Materials

Copy/paste into ChatGPT

MINE â€” Ask me these 8 questions (one by one) and push back on vagueness:
â€¢ Results Iâ€™ve produced â€¢ Who I enjoy helping â€¢ Topics I wonâ€™t shut up about â€¢ Proof/assets I can show
